features.name: Register & Login
features.survey_question: Register and login users

features.name: User Authentication
features.survey_question: Have users of different types? e.g normal users, admins, consumers, auditors

features.name: User States
features.survey_question: Have user states? e.g A user can be? Suspended, Active, Online, Offline, Banned, Deactivated

features.name: User State with Claims
features.survey_question: Allow and disallow users to certain pages based on user type or user state? e.g suspended user cannot visit payments or cashout page, or user that is currently restricted can not visit settings page

features.name: Invoice creation
features.survey_question: Create, edit, download or share invoices?

features.survey_question: Allow users to manage their clients?

features.survey_question: Cater for a payment option? e.g Ozow, Payfast, Ikhokha, Stripe or Peach payments

features.survey_question: Allow users to or make recurring transactions?

features.name: Shopping cart
features.survey_question: Have a shopping cart?

features.survey_question: Allow users to or make a payment?

features.survey_question: Track the spend of money?

features.survey_question: Handle tax calculations?

features.survey_question: Support the use and display of multiple currencies? e.g USD, ZAR, PULA, YEN

features.survey_question: Make financial plans?

features.survey_question: Allow users to create a service or product quote for a client? e.g Bill of quantities, Insurance quote, Project Cost

features.name: User Customizable Quote templates
features.survey_question: Allow my user's customers to customize their quotes?

features.name: Approval workflow
features.survey_question: Have an approval workflow? where a user of a certain type will submit an item for approval to a user of another type e.g a normal user submits a request to an admin user

features.name: Form Creation
features.survey_question: Allow users to create a form to collect data from other users?

features.name: Table Creation
features.survey_question: Allow users to create a table viewing results of a form?

features.survey_question: Allow users to change the app theme?

features.name: API Creation
features.survey_question: Be accesible to other systems via api

features.name: User profiles
features.survey_question: Allow users to create, edit and showcase their user profiles?

features.name: Social Feed
features.survey_question: Scroll through feed of things? See a feed of posts created by other users or new products added by vendors, funny videos, memes, Job Posts, Articles

features.name: Social Replies
features.survey_question: Reply to a comment or a chat message

features.name: Social chat
features.survey_question: Send and receive messages to or from another user? e.g Chat Inbox or Group or Channel

features.survey_question: Allow user to have a portal for groups or communities with other users?

features.name: Media sharing

features.survey_question: Stream media file? e.g watch a video or listen to a song?

features.survey_question: Stream live?

features.survey_question: Search for items e.g Search for a product or search for a friend or search for a company?

features.name: Task management
features.survey_question: Manage Tasks?

features.name: Timelines

features.survey_question: Track how a user spent their time on a device?
